content.content: Only the owner can invite collaborators.
Only the owner (@bobolive) can transfer this repository.

Alice cannot be invited to Bob's repository or have it transferred to her since these actions can only be performed by Bob, the owner of the repository. 

If Alice wants to collaborate, she may need to reach out to Bob directly to request an invitation. If there's anything else you would like me to assist you with, please let me know!
